settings.heading: Our Standards
settings.text:
No Hidden Ingredients
Every ingredient and dosage of our proprietary blends is clearly marked for your review.

No Pushy Sales Pitches
We are focused on empowering survivors with the knowledge they need, not products they don’t want.

No Harmful Fillers
Free from unnecessary and harmful cancer promoting additives.

No Quality Compromises
We sustainably source and test our own powdered raw ingredients before encapsulating them into pills and then packets.

settings.heading: Your Subscription
settings.text:
With a subscription with us, you can expect the following:

Refillable Dispenser
Your first order will come with a free refillable dispenser to store your daily packets.

Hassle-Free Replacements
Enjoy automatic refills every 4-weeks, making it simple to stay on track every day.

Cancel Anytime
Easily view and manage your subscription by logging into your account.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

settings.heading: Expert Formulated, Survivor Specific
settings.content: Our products are the result of thousands of hours spent by experts from various fields, researching and selecting ingredients scientifically shown to benefit the overall wellness of cancer survivors. Each chosen ingredient is specifically meant to promote your health now and in the long-term.*

settings.heading: Science Meets Tradition
settings.content: Our products combine the best of both worlds, bringing together the latest scientific advancements and time-tested traditional remedies. Natural ingredients have been benefiting people for centuries - we didn't invent them - but we rigorously analyze them through scientific research and verified studies ensuring that each ingredient we use is proven to be beneficial, not just a fad.*

settings.heading: Superior Quality, Optimal Dosing
settings.content: We did our quality homework so you don't have to. Our USA based manufacturing plants adhere to the highest quality control standards, similar to those used in the production of prescription medications. We only source from verified suppliers and rigorously test all ingredients at several stages of the process. We don’t market blends with hidden dosing or ingredients. What we say is in our pills is in our pills—nothing less, nothing more.*

settings.heading: Survivorship Simplified
settings.content: Say goodbye to the hassle of multiple pill bottles! Start an easy-to-remember routine with our carefully curated AM/PM packets, designed to include supplements that boost each other’s absorption, are taken at the right time of day, and in the right daily doses. All meant to maximize bioavailability, absorption, and benefits to you!*

settings.title: FAQs
settings.subheading: Find answers to your most frequently asked questions

settings.title: Our Multivitamin Packs
settings.content: Find a routine that's right for you

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subheading: Find answers to your most frequently asked questions

settings.title: Why do I need an AM and PM Packet?
settings.content: At SurvivorRx, we've taken the initiative to streamline your supplement routine by curating our products into convenient AM/PM packs. Our meticulously crafted formulas are brimming with a multitude of nutrients tailored to meet your nutritional requirements. Our AM packets contain ingredients ideal for morning consumption, whether with or without food. Similarly, our PM packets are specifically formulated for evening intake, best accompanied by a meal.

settings.title: Can I take other supplements with my SurvivorRx Products?
settings.content: We have specifically designed our supplements with Survivor’s comprehensive nutritional needs in mind. We have optimally dosed our ingredients and recommend using caution when adding any other supplements as in some cases, taking too much of some things can cause more harm than good. As always, we recommend you speak with your health provider for your specific needs.

settings.title: How do your prices compare to competition?
settings.content: Our mission is to provide you with convenient access to the highest quality professional-grade supplements available today. We take pride in setting ourselves apart in this regard. As is often the case in life, the adage "you get what you pay for" rings true with supplements. However, it's not simply a matter of price; there's a distinct reason why professional-grade supplements command a higher cost than their over-the-counter counterparts. While we offer premium brands, you can trust that our prices remain competitive across our entire range. We maintain close partnerships with our suppliers to ensure that we secure the best prices possible, and we're committed to passing those savings along to you.

settings.title: What if I miss a dose or two?
settings.content: If you missed taking a pack, we recommend skipping that dose, then taking your next pack at the assigned time.
